item.title: Deep Space Network III
item.description: The third mix in the Deep Space Network series. This release highlights more of the deeper side of techno and house, spanning multiple decades of tracks. Highlights from Shinichi Atobe, Black Jazz Consortium, Chaos In The CBD and Grant

item.title: The Sofa Sessions Volume II
item.description: The Sofa Sessions mix series focuses on the soulful side of electronic music. The series features styles ranging from Acid Jazz, Downtempo, Drum and Bass, Hip-Hop and Trip-Hop. Music with soul, music to lounge to. Volume II features classic Drum & Bass releases that helped define or were influenced by the Jazzy, Atmospheric and Intelligent Drum & Bass sounds that dominated the latter part of the 1990s. Featuring releases from Moving Shadow, Good Looking Records, Earth and others.

item.title: The Sofa Sessions I
item.description: The Sofa Sessions mix series focuses on the soulful side of electronic music. The series features styles ranging from Acid Jazz, Downtempo, Drum and Bass, Hip-Hop and Trip-Hop. Music with soul, music to lounge to. Volume I - Nod your head, tap your feet.. Easy listening for a lazy sunny Sunday afternoon. A mix of downtempo and jazzy hip-hop, inspired by the Mushroom Jazz mix series.

item.title: The Difference
item.description: Spanning 3 decades, featuring tracks from labels Strictly Rhythm, La Vida, Chikyu-u, Rutilance Recordings

item.title: Deep Space Network II
item.description: Second mix in the Deep Space Network mix series. A mix of dub house and techno sounds.

item.title: Deep Space Network I
item.description: The first in the series of dub and deep techno sets. Spanning across multiple decades including tracks from the labels Transmat, Plus 8 , Djax Up-Beats and others.

item.title: Re:Cycle
item.description: OLD is NEW. A mix of 90s style breakbeats infused with house/techno…….

item.title: Jellyfin Plugin Lastfm
item.description: This is a plugin for the JellyFin media center that enables audio scrobbling to Last.FM as well as a metadata fetcher source. This plug-in was migrated from the original Emby repository and has been adapted to function within the JellyFin ecosystem. This plugin cannot be distributed with Jellyfin due to a missing compatible license. I will attempt to keep this repo up-to-date and in-sync as the Jellyfin project matures. Build .

item.title: Zoofuse
item.description: ·▄▄▄▄• ·▄▄▄▄• ▄▌.▄▄ · ▄▄▄ . ▪▀·.█▌▪ ▪ ▐▄▄·█▪██▌▐█ ▀. ▀▄.▀· ▄█▀▀▀• ▄█▀▄ ▄█▀▄ ██▪ █▌▐█▌▄▀▀▀█▄▐▀▀▪▄ █▌▪▄█▀▐█▌.▐▌▐█▌.▐▌██▌.▐█▄█▌▐█▄▪▐█▐█▄▄▌ ·▀▀▀ • ▀█▄▀▪ ▀█▄▀▪▀▀▀ ▀▀▀ ▀▀▀▀ ▀▀▀ ZooFUSE implements a FUSE filesystem that is backed by a ZooKeeper directory tree. This allows the user to navigate through the Zookeeper tree structure using the same command line tools commonly used to navigate a local file system. Some of the current features include Easily mount a remote Zookeeper instance onto a local FUSE filesystem Ability to “chroot” or jail a Zookeeper path to the Fuse root (see zkroot flag).

item.title: Google Assistant Action Songexplorer
item.description: Google Assistant Catalog Listing SongExplorer is a Google Home assistant for music recommendations, built with Go and Redis. Using Google Home and API.ai In a nutshell this service consists of the following a very light Go web API (https://github.com/jesseward/songexplorer) An agent created at api.ai All api.ai intents, with the exception of the ‘help’ intent are answered by the songdiscover webhook (this Go app). A self hosted Go app. Its sole purpose is to massage communication between api.

item.title: About
item.description: I am currently located in Ontario, Canada, working remotely as a Senior Staff Site Reliability Engineer at LinkedIn. Free time is spent with family, traveling, working on my github projects or constantly sampling new and old music.
